###################################    ## p. 645 (#669) ############################################  Appendix 17 Tons of Bombs Dropped December 1941 to August 1945 ETO MTO 1941 Dec Total Against and Japan Total Against Total Against Germany Germany Japan 36 36 1942 Jan Feb 240 47 2240 Mar 68 68 Apr 128 128 May 184 184 Jun 115 115 295 410 Jul 357 357 299 656 Aug 135 414 549 409 958 Sep 215 482 697 459 1,156 Oct 334 771 1,105 564 1,669 Nov 612 1,195 1,807 752 2,559 Dec 417 1,076 1,493 855 2,348 Total 1942 1,713 4,410 6,123 4,080 10,203 1943 Jan 739 1,983 2,722 859 3,581 Feb 705 1,719 2,424 1,147 3,571 Mar 1,530 2,773 4,303 1,644 5,947 Apr 1,130 5,053 6,183 2,033 8,216 May 2,688 7,297 9,985 2,344 12,329 Jun 2,468 8,596 11,064 1,845 12,909 Jul 4,366 13,846 18,212 4,041 22,253 Aug 5,072 12,584 17,656 4,333 21,989 Sep 8,519 13,942 22,461 4,212 26,673 Oct 6,015 7,625 13,640 5,013 18,653 Nov 8,309 9,480 17,789 5,921 23,710 Dec 14,114 13,564 27,678 11,291 38,969 Total 1943 55,655 98,462 154,117 44,683 198,800 1944 Jan 14,015 19,097 33,112 7,885 40,997 Feb 22,566 11,595 34,161 9,912 44,073 Mar 26,539 17,440 43,979 12,255 56,234 Apr 38,540 29,856 68,396 13,537 81,933 May 56,874 46,075 102,949 14,715 117,664 Jun 85,648 36,287 121,935 10,499 132,434 Jul 63,062 41,769 104,831 10,034 114,865 Aug 67,766 40,280 108,046 9,458 117,504 Sep 52,175 29,285 81,460 12,849 94,309 Oct 52,860 22,108 74,968 12,329 87,297 Nov 51,413 26,695 78,108 15,025 93,133 Dec 60,501 26,506 87,007 18,528 105,535 Total 1944 591,959 346,993 938,952 147,026 1,085,978 1945 Jan 54,474 14,539 69,013 19,335 88,348 Feb 80,348 32,661 113,009 23,919 136,928 Mar 118,003 41,120 159,123 41,088 200,211 Apr 69,242 44,365 113,607 44,007 157,614 May 368 151 519 47,180 47,699 Jun 50,893 50,893 Jul 53,665 53,665 Aug 26,869 26,869 Total 1945 322,435 132,836 455,271 306,956 762,227 Grand Total 971,762 582,701 1,554,463 502,781 2,057,244   ## p. 646 (#670) ############################################  Appendix 18 Tons of Bombs D
